original_text: But when Herod's birthday was kept, the daughter of Herodias danced before them, and pleased Herod.
korean_text: 마침 헤롯의 생일이 되어 헤로디아의 딸이 연석 가운데서 춤을 추어 헤롯을 기쁘게 하니

sentences.original_text: But when Herod's birthday was kept
the daughter of Herodias danced before them
sentences.korean_translation: 헤로디아의 딸이 그들 앞에서 춤을 추었다
